answers.answer: I get that to. I have low sugar and anemic. Poor circulation can play a part in it to. Also low iron and not eating enough.
The only way WE can help you is to tell you to see an MD,  or call the hospital for they sometimes have free diabetes screening tests. Thats how I found out.

Please ask your parents to take you to see a Dr.  If it is diabetes it needs to be treated.They should give you general check up and screening for diabetes.LEt us know how you go & hope you feel better soon.

question: I'm 14 and when I was 11 I was very close to getting diabetes but since then I haven't been close. In the past 3 weeks I've been very very weak and I get dizzy spells  and my vision blurrs. I've researched it online an  it says I could have diabetes. I'm very concerned. Please help me find an answer!
title: please help
